t: Amazon Global Selling | Sell & Ship Products Internationally - Amazon
s: What is Amazon Global Selling? It's a program that allows you to sell your products internationally through Amazon. Providing you with direct access to millions of customers around the world.

t: Global Store Landing Page @ Amazon.com
s: The Amazon Global Store purchases are supported by Amazon.com Customer Service. You can return items within 30 days of delivery for a full refund. Simply use the Amazon.com Returns Support Center. The Amazon Global Store will cover the cost of international return shipping up to $20.

t: Amazon International shopping and shipping made easy
